definition: The term refers to the period of time that occurs after the end of the working week, specifically the evening of the sixth day of the week. It is commonly utilized to describe the start of the weekend and is often associated with relaxation, social activities, and leisurely pursuits.

examples.german: Ich gehe am Freitagabend ins Kino.
examples.english: I am going to the cinema on Friday evening.

examples.german: Wir treffen uns jeden Freitagabend zum Essen.
examples.english: We meet every Friday evening for dinner.

examples.german: Am Freitagabend habe ich immer Zeit f√ºr meine Hobbys.
examples.english: I always have time for my hobbies on Friday evening.

examples.german: Freitagabend ist mein Lieblingsabend der Woche.
examples.english: Friday evening is my favorite evening of the week.

examples.german: Am Freitagabend gehe ich gerne mit Freunden aus.
examples.english: I like to go out with friends on Friday evening.
